CustomElement.title: Custom Element Client Extension
CustomElement.description: Custom element defines CSS and JavaScript resources that will be rendered into a provided HTML <custom-element>. This provides full integration with the Liferay host page. Each custom element client extension is made available as a widget.
CustomElement.x-intellij-html-description: Custom element defines CSS and JavaScript resources that will be rendered into a provided HTML <custom-element>. This provides full integration with the Liferay host page. Each custom element client extension is made available as a widget. Learn more about custom element client extensions.

type.title: Type
type.description: Defines the type of the client extension

baseURL.description: The base path from which all of the client extension’s defined resources are served.

name.title: Name
name.description: The client extension’s name (as it appears in the UI). A name is required for front-end client extensions.

sourceCodeURL.title: Source Code URL
sourceCodeURL.description: The address to the client extension’s source repository.

htmlElementName.title: HTML Element Name
htmlElementName.description: The HTML element name that refers to the custom element, which is rendered in the page markup.

useESM.title: Use ES Modules
useESM.description: Whether the JavaScript code uses ESM format. When true, the JavaScript is added to the page with the type="module" property.

urls.title: JavaScript URL
urls.description: List of paths to JavaScript resources that are added to the HTML head when the widget is used on a page. One of these resources must contain the custom element initialization code. This combines with baseURL to form a complete URL.

cssURLs.title: CSS URL
cssURLs.description: List of CSS paths added to the HTML head when the custom element is used on a page.

instanceable.title: Instanceable
instanceable.description: Whether the custom element widget can appear multiple times on a page.

portletCategoryName.title: Portlet Category Name
portletCategoryName.description: The menu category of the custom element widget.

friendlyURLMapping.title: Friendly URL Mapping
friendlyURLMapping.description: Mapping of a friendly URL prefix to the specific custom element widget.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Properties to append as attributes to the custom HTML element. They use a newline as a separator and are processed as Java properties.
